mapper.update: update operate_records set operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_user_type = #{operateUserType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, types = #{types,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_target_id = #{operateTargetId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_target_type = #{operateTargetType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operate_user_name = #{operateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, operate_user_id, operate_user_type, types, created_at, updated_at, operate_target_id, operate_target_type, operate_user_name, content from operate_records where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
